com.compomics.util.experiment.identification.peptide_fragmentation.models.ms2pip.features_configuration

Class FeaturesMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.compomics.util.experiment.identification.peptide_fragmentation.models.ms2pip.features_configuration.FeaturesMap

  • public class FeaturesMap
extends Object
    This class contains a map of selected features indexed by category.
    Author:
    Marc Vaudel

      static int currentVersion
      Current version of the features.

    • Field Detail

      • currentVersion

        public static final int currentVersion
        Current version of the features. This number should be incremented when non backward compatible changes are made to the implemented features.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
